'''Dream Solvent'''  is an item that allows the conversion of 5★ [[Character Level-Up Materials]] and [[Billet]]s using [[Alchemy]].

==How to Obtain==
* Claim Trounce Blossom from [[Weekly Boss]]es with [[Original Resin]] for a 33% chance to drop.
* Complete {{Quest|No Mere Stone}}
* Reach [[Vanarana's Favor]] Level 40
* Reach [[Fountain of Lucine's Accolades]] Level 40

==Usage==
# Head to a [[Crafting Bench]]
# Under Conversion recipes, select the filter "Transfigured Dreams."
# Use the Dream Solvent to convert between weekly boss drops from the same boss. One Dream Solvent is required to convert a single material. No [[Mora]] Cost.
